job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T00:09:01.000Z", "description": "Blue Rose is currently seeking someone with the skills to help us improve the public-facing systems of a federal client. Specifically, you will implement a new chatbot product to enhance customer experience and reduce operational costs by using conversational AI technology - natural language processing (NLP) and other cognitive APIs. You will develop, train, and evaluate natural language processing (NLP) models for the deployed Conversational AI Platform.

The successful candidate will:
  • use statistical analysis and programming to analyze and interpret language datasets
  • provide expertise in AI services, including Natural Language Processing, and ML architecture
  • analyze training and test data to help fine tune semantic models to improve overall accuracy and performance
  • develop supervised and unsupervised learning models to provide actionable insights for business requirements.
Requirements:
  • Must be U.S. Citizen
  • Experienced in Machine Learning concepts and algorithms, Python (3.X), Scikit-Learn, Natural Language Tool Kit, and SQL (Relational or NoSQL)
  • Preferred experience with backend web development (Java, Mongo/DynamoDB, NodeJS) and RESTful Architecture
The salary for this position is $110,000 - $130,000 annually.
